description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, part side extension, part first floor rear extension, side and rear roof extensions with one front roof window to the house
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [BP, 00, 01, 02, 03, 04, 06, 11, 12, 17, 18 received 25/11/2024 05 Rev A, 09 Rev A, 14 Rev A, 15 Rev A, 16 Rev A, 19 Rev A, Design & Access Statement Rev A received 21/01/2025
07 Rev B, 08 Rev B, 10 Rev B received 23/01/2025].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Condition : 4 - The new windows formed in the north elevation upper floors shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening below 1.7 metres above internal floor level. The windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than in accordance with the requirements of this condition. 

Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy
